name: BugZ (ARez1)
description:
Alright, lets slay some Zombies using Bugs, shall we?!

In this game you are the last Bug-Bender. Use your bugs as traps to kill some zombies! Or just grab the car and run them over like a total badass ^^

Please let me know your feedback down in the comments :D

Also, i apologize for any Bugs in here :D (No, this time i meant real game bugs :P)
